title: $:/plugins/xp/diary
name: Diary
author: kl
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/xp/diary/Actions/general":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Actions/general","tags":"$:/tags/Actions/Journal","text":"\whitespace trim <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags="[]"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> class="journal"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text={{{ [<__tid__>get[text]] }}}/> "},"$:/xp/diary/Actions/new-template":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Actions/new-template","tags":"$:/tags/Actions/Journal","text":"\whitespace trim <$vars timestamp=<>> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{{ [[$:/xp/diary/Templates/]addsuffix] }}} tags="$:/tags/JournalTemplate" caption=<> action-tiddler="$:/xp/diary/Actions/general" color="rgba(153,204,102,0.4)"> <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/tags/JournalTemplate" $subfilter="+[insertbefore,<__tid__>]" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<>/> "},"$:/xp/diary/Actions/nine-square-diary":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Actions/nine-square-diary","tags":"$:/tags/Actions/Journal","text":"\whitespace trim <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags="[]"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> class="journal"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text={{{ [<__tid__>get[text]search-replace:g[TODAY],] }}}/> "},"$:/xp/dailynotes/AddTodo":{"title":"$:/xp/dailynotes/AddTodo","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/language/projectify/ \define add-todo-actions() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[get[todo-name]trim[]!is[blank]]" variable="ignore"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{{ [[$:/gtd/]addsuffix] }}} tags={{{ [{$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/QuadrantTag}addsuffix[ GTD]] }}} caption={{{ [get[todo-name]] }}} due=<>> <$reveal state="$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/ContentType" type="nomatch" text=""> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> type={{$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/ContentType}}/> <$action-listops $tiddler={{$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/QuadrantTag}} $subfilter="[]"/> <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<> todo-name qtag /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-auto-save-wiki"/> \end \define cancel-input-actions() <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<> todo-name /> <$vars stateTiddler="$:/temp/gtd/add-todo/sidebar">
<$keyboard key="escape" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="enter" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="ctrl+1" actions="<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/QuadrantIcon' text='$:/xp/images/q1'/><$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/QuadrantTag' text='$:/q1'/>"> <$keyboard key="ctrl+2" actions="<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/QuadrantIcon' text='$:/xp/images/q2'/><$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/QuadrantTag' text='$:/q2'/>"> <$keyboard key="ctrl+3" actions="<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/QuadrantIcon' text='$:/xp/images/q3'/><$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/QuadrantTag' text='$:/q3'/>"> <$keyboard key="ctrl+4" actions="<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/QuadrantIcon' text='$:/xp/images/q4'/><$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/QuadrantTag' text='$:/q4'/>"> <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="todo-name" focus="yes" class="xp-gtd-addtodo-textbox-input" placeholder="Add todo..." />
<$list filter="[get[todo-name]trim[]!is[blank]]" variable="ignore" storyview="pop"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiny-gap-left" actions=<> tooltip="Add new item" aria-label="new item" > {{$:/core/images/new-button}} <$vars currentTiddler=<>> <$transclude tiddler="$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/ui/SideBar/TodoQuadrant" mode="inline"/>
"},"$:/DailyNotes":{"title":"$:/DailyNotes","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/xp/images/daily","text":"\define today() <> \end \define today-chinese() <> \end
<$list filter="[{$:/language}match[$:/languages/zh-Hans]]" emptyMessage=<> variable="ignore"> <>
<$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="$:/dailynotes-editing $:/dailynotes-journallist $:/dailynotes-things $:/dailynotes-activities" default="$:/dailynotes-editing" state="$:/state/tab/dailynotes" />"},"$:/xp/diary/Templates/blank":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Templates/blank","action-tiddler":"$:/xp/diary/Actions/general","caption":"Blank","color":"rgba(204,204,204,0.5)","tags":"$:/tags/JournalTemplate"},"$:/xp/diary/Templates/five-minute-journal":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Templates/five-minute-journal","action-tiddler":"$:/xp/diary/Actions/general","caption":"Five Minute Journal","color":"rgba(0,153,255,0.5)","description":"「5 分钟日记法」鼓励我们每天仅需花费 5-10 分钟，通过回答 5 个问题来记录一天的生活，其中早晨回答前 3 个问题，晚上回答后 2 个问题。","source":"https://www.wolai.com/6eNHTLKUcys71Cg8YrxtaD","tags":"$:/tags/JournalTemplate","text":"!! ❶ 令我感恩的 3 件事... //意识到生命中的美好点滴，不以消极的心态开始一天。醒来以后不妨感谢一下窗外明媚的阳光和温暖的被窝或者给你做了早餐的家人。// # # # !! ❷ 会使今天更美好的 3 件事？ //做了会感觉美好和轻松的待办事项，要尽量具体且有希望完成，三件事情足够充实一天。// # # # !! ❸ 今天我是谁？ //明确自己的身份和职责有助于让生活和工作更高效。今天你是谁呢？是即将上线的项目负责人，是要按时接孩子放学的家长还是准备考试的学生。// 我是谁？ !! ❹ 今天发生的 3 件美妙的事... //回顾今天让自己有所触动或开心的事情，可以对应第二个问题回答，也可以记录有哪些意外收获。// # # # !! ❺ 怎么做会让今天更好？ //今天的你已经足够好了，但不妨再做个小总结想想有哪些可以改进的地方，让今天变得更好。// 怎么做？ "},"$:/xp/diary/Templates/new-template":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Templates/new-template","action-tiddler":"$:/xp/diary/Actions/new-template","caption":"New Template","color":"rgba(204,204,204,0.5)","icon":"$:/core/images/new-button","tags":"$:/tags/JournalTemplate"},"$:/xp/diary/Templates/nine-square-diary":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Templates/nine-square-diary","action-tiddler":"$:/xp/diary/Actions/nine-square-diary","caption":"Nine Square Diary","color":"rgba(255,204,0,0.5)","description":"「九宫格日记法」通过制定九个维度来轻松地进行晨间日记。每天花 3 分钟在相应维度内填上“关键词”，回顾昨天，展望今天。","tags":"$:/tags/JournalTemplate","text":"!! ⓿ 日期/天气/心情 |!DATE |TODAY | |!WEATHER |阴·晴·风·雨·雪 | |!MOOD |🙂🙁😔😡😲😵‍💫😭💯 高兴·快乐·庆幸·甜蜜·愤慨·恼怒·气愤·悲哀·悲伤·伤感·伤心·痛苦·痛心·心酸·胆怯·害怕·惊吓·可怕·着迷·心醉·冤仇·仇视·嫉妒·反感·可恨·可恶·讨厌·憎恨·别扭·窝囊·担忧·担心·发愁·忧虑·忧郁·无能感·骄傲·傲慢·体面·自卑·自信·自豪·委屈·急躁·焦虑·恐慌·羞愧·害羞·亏心·愧疚·为难·丢脸·耻辱·悔过·懊悔·后悔·内疚·好奇·惊讶·疑惑·迷茫·悼念·牵挂·惦念·轻视·歧视·顺心·等待·憧憬·达观·无望·心寒·孤单·寂寞·哀伤·安定·坦然·安心·释怀·踏实·平静·紧张·消沉·低沉·解气·泄气·丧气·厌倦·辛酸·失意 | !! ❶ 开心的事 !! ❷ 为他人做的事 !! ❸ 计划/工作/备忘 !! ❹ 比起昨天的进步 !! ❺ 心情/感悟/灵感 !! ❻ 关注/八卦/新闻 !! ❼ 健康/饮食/体重 !! ❽ 梦境 "},"$:/config/xp/DailyNotes/DefaultView":{"title":"$:/config/xp/DailyNotes/DefaultView","text":"list"},"$:/dailynotes-activities":{"title":"$:/dailynotes-activities","caption":"今日活动","text":"\define tiddlers-created-today() [all[tiddlers]!is[system]!has[draft.of]sameday:created] \end \define tiddlers-modified-today() [all[tiddlers]!is[system]!has[draft.of]sameday] \end <$macrocall $name="table-dynamic" caption="Created Tiddlers" filter=<> fields="tbl-expand title tags" class="w-100" editButton=no emptyMessage=" " /> <$macrocall $name="table-dynamic" caption="Modified Tiddlers" filter="[subfilter] -[subfilter]" fields="tbl-expand title tags" class="w-100" editButton=no emptyMessage=" " />"},"$:/dailynotes-edit-tiddler":{"title":"$:/dailynotes-edit-tiddler"},"$:/dailynotes-editing":{"title":"$:/dailynotes-editing","caption":"每日一记","text":"\define config-visibility-title() $:/config/EditorToolbarButtons/Visibility/$(currentTiddler)$ \end \define importFileActions() <$action-popup $state=<> $coords="(0,0,0,0)" $floating="yes"/> \end \define select-a-template() \whitespace trim Start with a template:
<$list filter="[[$:/tags/JournalTemplate]tagging[]!is[draft]]"> <$macrocall $name="flex-button" tid=<> icon={{{ [] :cascade[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerIconFilter]!is[draft]get[text]] }}} colour={{{ [] :cascade[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerColourFilter]!is[draft]get[text]] }}} palette={{$:/palette}}/>
\end \define input-cancel-actions() \whitespace trim <$action-confirm $message="Are you sure you want to delete Today's Note?"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \end \define exclude() $:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/transcludify $:/xp/ui/EditorToolbar/inc $:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/excise $:/xp/ui/EditorToolbar/annotate \end <$let editPreviewStateTiddler={{{ [{$:/config/ShowEditPreview/PerTiddler}!match[yes]then[$:/state/showeditpreview]] :else[] }}} importTitle=<> importState=<> journalTitleTemplate={{$:/config/NewJournal/Title}} journalTag={{{ [enlist{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags}first[]] }}} editTiddler="$:/dailynotes-edit-tiddler" placeholder="Type the text"> <$wikify name="journalTitle" text="<$macrocall $name='now' format=<>/>"> <$list filter="[is[tiddler]]" emptyMessage=<>>
<$link to=<>/><$checkbox tiddler=<> tag="Private"> Private<$checkbox tiddler=<> tag="Star"> Star <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$keyboard key="((input-cancel))" actions=<>> <$dropzone importTitle=<> autoOpenOnImport="no" contentTypesFilter={{$:/config/Editor/ImportContentTypesFilter}} class="tc-dropzone-editor" enable={{{ [{$:/config/DragAndDrop/Enable}match[no]] :else[subfilter{$:/config/Editor/EnableImportFilter}then[yes]else[no]] }}} filesOnly="yes" actions=<> >
get[text]match[yes]then[tc-tiddler-preview]else[tc-tiddler-preview-hidden]] [[tc-tiddler-editor]] +[join[ ]] }}}> <$transclude tiddler="$:/xp/diary/editor" mode="inline"/> <$list filter="[get[text]match[yes]]" variable="ignore">
<$transclude tiddler={{$:/state/editpreviewtype}} mode="inline"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/preview/output" mode="inline"/>
"},"$:/dailynotes-journallist":{"title":"$:/dailynotes-journallist","caption":"日记列表","text":"\whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ \define storeTitle() $:/temp/search/journals \define cancel-search-actions() <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[] [] [] [] [] []"/> \define defaultView() $:/config/xp/DailyNotes/DefaultView \define filterState() $:/state/filter/dailynotes \define encryptStatus() $:/temp/filter/dailynotes/Encrypted \define privateStatus() $:/temp/filter/dailynotes/Private \define starStatus() $:/temp/filter/dailynotes/Starred \define dateStatus() $:/temp/filter/dailynotes/Date \define input-accept-actions-date() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> filter={{{ [get[text]addprefixaddsuffix] }}}/> \define input-cancel-actions-date() <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<> text/> \define resetConditionButton() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[has[text]] [has[text]] [has[text]] [is[tiddler]] [has[filter]] +[limit[1]]">  <$button class="xp-aggrfilter-dynamic-btn"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[] [] [] []"/> <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<> filter/> reset \end \define dnTiddlerControls() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[all[current]has[text]]"> <$button to=<> tooltip="Open this tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/link}} <$list filter="[all[current]!tag[Star]]"> <$button actions="<$action-listops $tags='Star'/>" tooltip="Star this tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/xp/images/star}} <$list filter="[all[current]tag[Star]]"> <$button actions="<$action-listops $tags='-Star'/>" tooltip="Unstar this tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/star-filled}} <$list filter="$:/core/ui/Buttons/edit" storyview="pop" variable="listItem"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" filter="[] [encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]]"> <$transclude tiddler=<>/> \end \define deleteConditionButton() \whitespace trim <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Remove condition" aria-label="remove condition"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} \end <$vars journalTag={{{ [enlist{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags}first[]] }}}> <$list filter="[taglimit[1]]" emptyMessage="{{$:/aggregation/prompt}}" variable="ignore"> <$macrocall $name="keyboard-driven-input" tiddler=<> class="py-input input-larger" type="search" tag="input" filterMinLength="1" focus={{$:/config/xp/aggregation/SearchAutoFocus}} inputCancelActions=<> /> <$set name="stateTiddler" filter="[!is[missing]has[text]]" value=<> emptyValue=<>> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=""".xp-search-journals input"""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <> <> <$vars userInput={{{ [get[text]] }}} encryptRun={{{ [get[text]] }}} privateRun={{{ [get[text]] }}} starRun={{{ [get[text]] }}} timeRun={{{ [get[filter]] }}} limitRun=" +[limit[250]]" resultCount="<$count filter=<>/>" journalSearch="[tag!sort[created]search:*]" > <$set name="searchFilter" value={{{ [addsuffix[ ]addsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffix] }}}> <$set name="stateTiddler" filter="[!is[missing]get[text]trim[]!is[blank]]" value=<> emptyValue=<>> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="yes"> <> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="yes" animate="yes">
Filter conditions: <>
<$list filter="[taghas[encrypted]limit[1]]" variable="ignore"> <$list filter="[tagtag[Private]limit[1]]" variable="ignore"> <$list filter="[tagtag[Star]limit[1]]" variable="ignore">
Encrypted <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$radio field="text" value=" +[has[encrypted]]"> yes <$radio field="text" value=" +[!has[encrypted]]"> no <>
Private <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$radio field="text" value=" +[tag[Private]]"> yes <$radio field="text" value=" +[!tag[Private]]"> no <>
Starred <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$radio field="text" value=" +[tag[Star]]"> yes <$radio field="text" value=" +[!tag[Star]]"> no <>
Time <$select tiddler=<> field="filter" class="xp-aggregation-select" actions="<$list filter='[search:filter[regexp:created]]'><$action-setfield $tiddler=<> status='show'/>"> <$vars pt=" +[regexp:created[^" st="]]"> <$list filter="[is[tiddler]]"> <$macrocall $name="keyboard-driven-input" tiddler=<> type="search" tag="input" size=7 focus="no" inputCancelActions=<> inputAcceptActions=<> /> <$button> Enter <>
<$reveal state=<> type="match" text="yes"> <> <$reveal state=<> default="list" type="nomatch" text="card">
<$list filter=<>> <$vars transclusion=<>>
<$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible tc-manager-list-item-heading xp-manager-item-heading" selectedClass="tc-manager-list-item-heading-selected"> <$text text=<>/> <$list filter="[all[current]has[encrypted]]"> {{$:/core/images/locked-padlock}} <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default="" tag="div" class="tc-manager-list-item-content tc-popup-handle">
<> <$transclude mode="block"/>
<$reveal state=<> default="list" type="match" text="card">

<$list filter=<> template="$:/templates/transclusion-dailynotes"/>
"},"$:/dailynotes-things":{"title":"$:/dailynotes-things","caption":"今日任务","text":"\import $:/xp/aggregation-gtd/macros \define lingo-base() $:/language/projectify/

<$button to="GettingThingsDone" class="tc-btn-invisible xp-gtd-list-header-btn"> ~GettingThingsDone

{{$:/xp/dailynotes/AddTodo}}
<> <]">>
"},"$:/xp/diary/editor":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/editor","text":"\whitespace trim <$edit field="text" class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-edit-texteditor-body" placeholder={{{ [!is[blank]] ~[{$:/language/EditTemplate/Body/Placeholder}] }}} tabindex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}} focus="yes" cancelPopups="yes" fileDrop={{{ [{$:/config/DragAndDrop/Enable}match[no]] :else[subfilter{$:/config/Editor/EnableImportFilter}then[yes]else[no]] }}} ><$set name="targetTiddler" value=<> ><$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorToolbar]!has[draft.of]] -[enlist]" ><$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" class="tc-text-editor-toolbar-item-wrapper" ><$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/toolbar/button" mode="inline" /><$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorTools]!has[draft.of]]" ><$list filter={{!!condition}} variable="list-condition" ><$transclude/> "},"$:/xp/images/daily":{"title":"$:/xp/images/daily","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/xp/images/star":{"title":"$:/xp/images/star","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/xp/diary/macros/flex-button":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/macros/flex-button","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define flex-button-styles() background-color:$(backgroundColor)$; fill:$(foregroundColor)$; color:$(foregroundColor)$; \end \define flex-button-inner(tid,icon,colour,fallbackTarget,colourA,colourB) \whitespace trim <$vars foregroundColor=<> backgroundColor="""$colour$"""> <$button actions={{{ [{!!action-tiddler}has[text]get[text]] ~{{$:/xp/diary/Actions/general}} }}} dragFilter='[all[current]]' class="xp-flex-button tc-btn-invisible" style=<>>
has[description]then[xp-flex-button-name]else[xp-flex-button-name-only]] }}}> <$transclude tiddler="""$icon$"""/><$transclude field="caption"><$view field="title"/>
has[description]then[xp-flex-button-body]else[xp-flex-button-body-none]] }}}> <$transclude field="description" mode="block"/>
\end \define flex-button(tid,icon,colour,palette) \whitespace trim
>> <$macrocall $name="flex-button-inner" tid=<<__tid__>> icon="""$icon$""" colour="""$colour$""" fallbackTarget={{$palette$##tag-background}} colourA={{$palette$##foreground}} colourB={{$palette$##background}}/>
\end "},"$:/xp/diary/styles":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/styles","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":".xp-buttons { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; margin: 0 0 14px 0; } .tc-tiddlylink.xp-button { font-weight: normal; max-width: 100%; position: relative; display: flex; flex-direction: column; background: <>; color: <>; width: 200px; min-height: 0; padding: 0 0 0.5em 0; margin: 0.5em; border: none; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px 0 #d4d4d5, 0 0 0 1px #d4d4d5; transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease,transform .3s ease; } @media (max-width: 500px) { .xp-buttons { padding: 0; } .tc-tiddlylink.xp-button { margin: 0.25em; width: 45%; } } .xp-flex-button { position: relative; display: inline-block; } .xp-flex-button button:hover { <> } .xp-flex-button { width: 200px; height: 123.6px; padding: 1em; margin: .5em .6em; } button.xp-flex-button, span.xp-flex-button { display: inline-block; padding: 0.16em 0.7em; font-size: 0.9em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.2em; color: <>; white-space: break-spaces; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: <>; border-color: <>; border-radius: 1em; } .xp-flex-button svg, .xp-flex-button img { height: 0.9em; width: 0.9em; margin-right: 7px; margin-bottom: 1px; vertical-align: bottom; } .xp-flex-button-name, .xp-flex-button-name-only { font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.2; font-weight: 600; transition: color 0.3s ease-in-out; padding: 0.5em 10px; } .xp-flex-button-name-only { padding: 0 10px; } .xp-flex-button-body { position: relative; font-size: 0.8em; line-height: 1.2; margin: 0; height: 55px; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 4; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; } .xp-flex-button-body-none { display: none; } .xp-flex-button-body > p { margin: 0.25em 0; } "},"$:/tags/JournalTemplate":{"title":"$:/tags/JournalTemplate","list":"$:/xp/diary/Templates/blank $:/xp/diary/Templates/five-minute-journal $:/xp/diary/Templates/nine-square-diary $:/xp/diary/Templates/new-template"},"$:/templates/transclusion-dailynotes":{"title":"$:/templates/transclusion-dailynotes","text":"
! <$link><$view field="title"/><$list filter="[all[current]has[encrypted]]">{{$:/core/images/locked-padlock}}
Modified <$view field="modified" format="relativedate"/>
<$transclude/>
"},"$:/plugins/xp/diary/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/xp/diary/icon","text":""},"$:/plugins/xp/diary/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/xp/diary/readme","text":"; Diary : Show journal list in sidebar for easy access to DAILY NOTES. Also provides $:/DailyNotes to simplify the process of writing a diary. !! Journal Tag <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/xp/diary/NewJournal/Tag" default="" tag="input"/> > 注意事项：[[此标签|$:/config/xp/diary/NewJournal/Tag]]必须和[[默认的日志标签|$:/config/NewJournal/Tags]]一致。比如简体中文语言默认日志标签为「日志」，必须修改此处为 `日志`。之所以需要手动设置标签，是因为加密插件 $:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler 的原因，自动获取日志标签反而致使加密功能失效。 !! 依赖插件 * $:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler（提供加密功能） 如果使用 $:/DailyNotes，那么还需要安装以下插件（不使用可不安装）： * $:/plugins/xp/aggregation-gtd ** $:/plugins/xp/aggregation ** $:/plugins/nico/projectify ** $:/plugins/nico/projectify-zh-Hans ** $:/plugins/kookma/todolist * $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz !! 关于 Daily Notes * 这里的 $:/DailyNotes 只是让你在 TW 中写日记相对更简便一点。如果想要更便捷，又可以把数据交给第三方保管，可以试试「[[我来wolai|https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1tL41157Ea/]]」。 * 默认提供了三个模板。重新选择模板需要删除新建的日记条目。最快捷的方式是，在文本框中按 esc 和 enter 键。 * 你可以新建自己的模板。要查看一个模板，只需拖动卡片到搜索框中，然后按 enter 键。 * 如果你喜欢使用「每日一记」，可以考虑将 $:/DailyNotes 添加到 $:/DefaultTiddlers 中。 $:/DailyNotes 中的时间变量，是每次打开条目时刷新的。万一显示的时间信息不对，你需要刷新一下。参阅 [[now Macro|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/now%2520Macro.html]]。 > 其实时间是可以自动刷新的，参阅 [[TiddlyTools/Time/Alarms|https://tiddlytools.com/timer.html]]，但这将增加额外的性能开销，所以不做添加。 其他案例： * https://www.techlifeweb.com/tiddlywiki/dailynotes.html ** https://github.com/akhater/Daily-Notes-for-TW5 "},"$:/_tw5.com-card-template":{"title":"$:/_tw5.com-card-template","text":"\define tw-card-template(bordercolor:"")
<$link>
<$transclude field="caption"><$view field="title"/>
<$list filter="[is[current]has[community-author]]">by {{!!community-author}}

<$view field="description"/>

\end <$macrocall $name="tw-card-template" bordercolor={{!!color}}/>"},"$:/_tw5.com-styles":{"title":"$:/_tw5.com-styles","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":"\rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline macrocallblock .tc-double-spaced-list li { padding-bottom: .5em; padding-top: .5em; } .tc-link-info-item { border: 1px solid #ebefcd; padding: 5px 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; background: <>; font-size: 0.8em; line-height: 1.2; } .tc-link-info-item h1 { font-weight: 500; font-size: 16px; } .tc-scrollable-demo { border: 1px solid <>; background-color: <>; padding: 1em; height: 400px; position: relative; overflow: auto; } .tc-improvement-banner { font-size: 0.7em; background: #fcc; padding-left: 5px; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 12px; <> } @media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) { .tc-improvement-banner { } } @media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) { .tc-improvement-banner { margin-right: -53px; margin-left: -53px; } .tc-improvement-banner:before { display: block; position: absolute; width: 0; height: 0; content: " "; margin-left: -5px; margin-top: -10px; border-top: 5px solid transparent; border-left: 5px solid transparent; border-right: 5px solid #C07E7E; border-bottom: 5px solid #C07E7E; } } .tc-improvement-banner svg { width: 1em; height: 1em; } .tc-wrapper-flex { display: flex; } .tc-saving-sidebar { margin: 0; padding: 0; min-width: 200px; overflow: auto; } .tc-saving-sidebar a { display: block; } @media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) { .tc-wrapper-flex { flex-direction: column; } .tc-saving-sidebar { width: 100%; height: auto; } .tc-saving-sidebar a { float: left; } } .tc-saving-sidebar-category { margin-bottom: 10px; } .tc-saving-sidebar-category-title { font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 5px; font-size: 16px; } .tc-saving-sidebar-category-item { margin-left: 10px; } .tc-card { margin: 15px; padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 10px; border-top: 5px solid #45D3D3; box-shadow: 0 8px 17px -8px #A3A5AE; background-color: #FFF; width: 200px; transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out; font-size: 13px; line-height: 18px; } .tc-card:hover { box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); } .tc-card:hover .tc-card-title { color: #1462ff; } .tc-card-title { text-align: center; font-size: 1.2em; font-weight: 600; transition: color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px 0; } .tc-card-author { text-align: right; } .tc-card p { height: 67px; overflow: hidden; margin: 0; padding: 13px 0; } .tc-card a { color: #222; } .tc-card a:hover { text-decoration:none; } .tc-card a:active, .tc-card a:focus, .tc-btn-download:active, .tc-btn-download:focus{ outline: none; } div.content { padding: 1px 16px; display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; } .tc-btn-download { width: 250px; padding: 10px; border-radius: 5px; background: #1462ff; border-radius: 5px; border: none; box-shadow: 0 2px 2px 0 #4a74c9; overflow: hidden; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.4em; color: #fff; fill: #fff; } .tc-btn-download:active { background: #1475ff; }"},"$:/core/ui/Actions/new-journal":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Actions/new-journal","description":"create a new journal tiddler","rewrite":"5.2.3","tags":"$:/tags/Actions","text":"\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ $(tagsFieldTags)$ \whitespace trim <$vars journalTitleTemplate={{$:/config/NewJournal/Title}} textFieldTags={{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags}} tagsFieldTags={{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags!!tags}} journalText={{$:/config/NewJournal/Text}}> <$wikify name="journalTitle" text="<$macrocall $name='now' format=<>/>"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text=""> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<> tags=<> text={{{ [get[]] }}}/> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=""> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<> tags=<> text=<> class="journal"/> "},"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-private-journal":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-private-journal","description":"create a new private journal tiddler","tags":"$:/tags/Actions","text":"\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ $(tagsFieldTags)$ $(privateTextFieldTags)$ $(privateTagsFieldTags)$ \whitespace trim <$vars textFieldTags={{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags}} tagsFieldTags={{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags!!tags}} privateTextFieldTags={{$:/config/xp/diary/NewPrivateJournal/Tag}} privateTagsFieldTags={{$:/config/xp/diary/NewPrivateJournal/Tag!!tags}} journalText={{$:/config/NewJournal/Text}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" tags=<> text=<> class="journal" color="#5e36bf"/> <$list filter="[[Private]!has[title]]"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle="Private" tags="Private" color="#5e36bf"/> "},"$:/xp/diary/Buttons/card-view":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Buttons/card-view","text":"\whitespace trim <$button to="$:/DiaryCard" tooltip="Card view" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> $to="$:/EncryptPrivateJournals"/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/images/private}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="encrypt private journals"/> "},"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/more-journal-actions":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/more-journal-actions","caption":"{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} more journal actions","description":"More actions","text":"\define config-title() $:/config/PageControlButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end <$button popup=<> tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/More/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/More/Caption}} selectedClass="tc-selected"> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/More/Caption}}/> <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes">
<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-icons" value="yes"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-text" value="yes"> <$list filter="$:/core/ui/Buttons/new-image $:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-private-journal $:/xp/ui/Buttons/encrypt-private-journals $:/xp/diary/Buttons/show-timeline $:/xp/diary/Buttons/card-view" variable="listItem"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" filter="[] [encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]]"> <$transclude tiddler=<> mode="inline"/>
"},"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-private-journal":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-private-journal","caption":"{{$:/xp/images/newprivate}} New private journal","description":"New private journal","text":"\whitespace trim <$button tooltip="Create a new private journal" aria-label="new private journal" class=<> actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-private-journal}}> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/images/newprivate}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="new private journal"/> "},"$:/xp/diary/Buttons/show-timeline":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Buttons/show-timeline","text":"\whitespace trim <$list filter="[[$:/config/Diary/timeline]get[text]] +[else[hide]!match[show]]" variable="ignore"> <$button set="$:/config/Diary/timeline" setTo="show" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/timestamp-on}} <$text text="show timeline"/> <$list filter="[[$:/config/Diary/timeline]get[text]] +[else[hide]match[show]]" variable="ignore"> <$button class=<>> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/config/Diary/timeline"/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/timestamp-on}} <$text text="hide timeline"/> "},"$:/xp/ui/SideBar/Diary":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/SideBar/Diary","caption":"Diary","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/xp/images/diary","tags":"$:/tags/SideBar","text":"\import $:/xp/diary/macros \whitespace trim \define journal-timeline(limit:"100",format:"DDth MMM YYYY",subfilter:"",dateField:"created")
<$list filter="[tag!is[system]!has[draft.of]$subfilter$has[$dateField$]!sort[$dateField$]limit[$limit$]eachday[$dateField$]]">
<$reveal state="$:/config/Diary/timeline" type="match" text="show"> <$view field="$dateField$" format="date" template="$format$"/> <$list filter="[tagsameday:$dateField${!!$dateField$}!is[system]!has[draft.of]$subfilter$!sort[$dateField$]]" template="$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/ui/listItemTemplate" />
\end <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" value=""> {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/new-journal}} <$button to="$:/EncryptJournals" tooltip="Encrypt journals" class="tc-tiny-gap-left"> {{$:/core/images/locked-padlock}} <$button to="$:/DailyNotes" tooltip="Daily Notes" class="tc-tiny-gap"> {{$:/xp/images/daily}} {{$:/xp/ui/Buttons/more-journal-actions}}
//<$count filter=<>/> journals//
<> "},"$:/DiaryCard":{"title":"$:/DiaryCard","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/xp/images/diarycard","text":"\import $:/xp/diary/macros \whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ \define cancel-search-actions() <$list filter="[{$:/temp/journalsearch/input}!match{$:/temp/journalsearch}]" emptyMessage="""<$action-deletetiddler $filter="[[$:/temp/journalsearch]] [[$:/temp/journalsearch/input]] [[$:/temp/journalsearch/selected-item]]" />"""><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/input" text={{$:/temp/journalsearch}}/><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/refresh" text="yes"/> \define input-accept-actions() <$list filter="[{$:/config/Search/NavigateOnEnter/enable}match[yes]]" emptyMessage="""<$list filter="[<__tiddler__>get[text]!is[missing]] ~[<__tiddler__>get[text]is[shadow]]"><$action-navigate $to={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/>"""><$action-navigate $to={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/> \define input-accept-variant-actions() <$list filter="[{$:/config/Search/NavigateOnEnter/enable}match[yes]]" emptyMessage="""<$list filter="[<__tiddler__>get[text]!is[missing]] ~[<__tiddler__>get[text]is[shadow]]"><$list filter="[<__tiddler__>get[text]minlength[1]]"><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/>"""><$list filter="[<__tiddler__>get[text]minlength[1]]"><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/>
<>. [[Filtering journals|$:/help/FilteringJournals]]
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/JournalFilter]!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude mode="inline"/>
<$macrocall $name="keyboard-driven-input" tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/input" storeTitle="$:/temp/journalsearch" refreshTitle="$:/temp/journalsearch/refresh" selectionStateTitle="$:/temp/journalsearch/selected-item" type="search" tag="input" configTiddlerFilter="[[$:/temp/journalsearch]]" firstSearchFilterField="text" inputAcceptActions=<> inputAcceptVariantActions=<> inputCancelActions=<>/> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/DiaryCard/FilterButton]!has[draft.of]]"><$transclude/>
<$reveal state="$:/temp/journalsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$reveal state="$:/config/journalsearch/searchmode" type="nomatch" text="yes"> <$let resultCount="<$count filter={{$:/temp/journalsearch}}/>">
<>
<$list filter={{$:/temp/journalsearch}}> addsuffix[-primaryList]] -[[$:/temp/journalsearch/selected-item]get[text]] +[then[]else[tc-list-item-selected]] }}}> {{||$:/xp/diary/card-template}}
<$reveal state="$:/config/journalsearch/searchmode" type="match" text="yes"> <$let resultCount="<$count filter=<>/>">
<>
<$list filter=<>> addsuffix[-primaryList]] -[[$:/temp/journalsearch/selected-item]get[text]] +[then[]else[tc-list-item-selected]] }}}> {{||$:/xp/diary/card-template}}
"},"$:/EncryptJournals":{"title":"$:/EncryptJournals","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/core/images/locked-padlock","text":"\import $:/xp/diary/macros \whitespace trim <$edit-text tag="input" tiddler="$:/temp/password1" placeholder="password" type="password" default="" col="4"/> <$edit-text tag="input" tiddler="$:/temp/password2" placeholder="confirm password" type="password" default="" col="4" class="tc-tiny-gap"/> <$encryptTiddler passwordTiddler1="$:/temp/password1" passwordTiddler2="$:/temp/password2" filter=<>> <$button message="tw-encrypt-tiddler" class="tc-tiny-gap"> Encrypt <$button message="tw-decrypt-tiddler"> Decrypt
//<$count filter=<>/> journals// <$list filter=<> template="$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/ui/listItemTemplate"/>
"},"$:/EncryptPrivateJournals":{"title":"$:/EncryptPrivateJournals","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/xp/images/private","text":"\import $:/xp/diary/macros \whitespace trim <$edit-text tag="input" tiddler="$:/temp/password1" placeholder="password" type="password" default="" col="4"/> <$edit-text tag="input" tiddler="$:/temp/password2" placeholder="confirm password" type="password" default="" col="4" class="tc-tiny-gap"/> <$encryptTiddler passwordTiddler1="$:/temp/password1" passwordTiddler2="$:/temp/password2" filter=<>> <$button message="tw-encrypt-tiddler" class="tc-tiny-gap"> Encrypt <$button message="tw-decrypt-tiddler"> Decrypt
//<$count filter=<>/> private journals// <$list filter=<> template="$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/ui/listItemTemplate"/>
"},"$:/xp/diary/Filter/FilterButtons/clear":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filter/FilterButtons/clear","tags":"$:/tags/DiaryCard/FilterButton","text":"\whitespace trim <$reveal state="$:/temp/journalsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} "},"$:/help/FilteringJournals":{"title":"$:/help/FilteringJournals","text":"\define sort-asc-svg() \end \define sort-desc-svg() \end \define sort-num-svg() \end 显示所有日记条目（标签为 Journal 的条目）^^（[[tag Operator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/tag%2520Operator.html]]）^^： > `[tag[Journal]]` 显示某年某月某日@@color:#03a9f4;创建@@的日记条目^^（[[regexp Operator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/regexp%2520Operator.html]]）^^： > `[tag[Journal]regexp:created[^2021]]` > `[tag[Journal]regexp:created[^202105]]` > `[tag[Journal]regexp:created[^20210507]]` 显示在某天@@color:#03a9f4;创建@@的日记条目^^（[[sameday Operator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/sameday%2520Operator.html]]）^^： > `[tag[Journal]sameday:created[20210507]]` 显示在多少天内@@color:#03a9f4;创建或者修改@@的日记条目，比如最近一周^^（[[days Operator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/days%2520Operator.html]]）^^： > `[tag[Journal]days:created[-7]]` //七天内创建的日记条目// > `[tag[Journal]!days:created[-7]]` //七天前创建的日记条目// > `[tag[Journal]days[-7]]` //七天内修改的日记条目// 显示最近@@color:#03a9f4;修改@@的日记条目，比如最近的 3 条修改^^（[[has Operator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/has%2520Operator.html]] / [[limit Operator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/limit%2520Operator.html]]）^^： > `[tag[Journal]has[modified]limit[3]]` 显示已@@color:#03a9f4;加密@@日记条目： > `[tag[Journal]has[encrypted]]` !! 排序,,（[[sort Operator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/sort%2520Operator.html]]）,, 默认按字段 title 升序排序 <>，您可以对显示结果进行重新排序。 按字段 title 降序排序 <>： > `[tag[Journal]!sort[]]` 按字段 created / modified 降序排序 <>： > `[tag[Journal]!sort[created]]` > `[tag[Journal]!sort[modified]]` !! 剔除 如果显示结果中存在多余的条目，可以将其剔除。 剔除系统条目： > `[tag[Journal]!is[system]]` == `[tag[Journal]!prefix[$:/]]` 剔除草稿条目： > `[tag[Journal]!has[draft.of]]` 剔除含有 test 标签的条目： > `[tag[Journal]!tag[test]]` !! 组合使用 `[tag[Journal]regexp:created[^2021]!is[system]!sort[created]]` 这个运行块含有四个步骤，从左至右开始执行： # 显示含有 Journal 标签的所有 [[non-shadow|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/ShadowTiddlers.html]] 条目； # 只显示 2021 年创建的条目； # 如果有 `$:/` 开头的系统条目，则将其剔除； # 最后根据 created 降序排序。 更多内容请访问 [[Filters|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/Filters.html]]、[[Filter Operators|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/Filter%2520Operators.html]]。"},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/AllJournals":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/AllJournals","description":"All journals","filter":"[tag!is[system]!sort[created]]","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"<>"},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/CommonFilters":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/CommonFilters","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"''Common filters:'' "},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/EncryptedJournals":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/EncryptedJournals","description":"Encrypted journals","filter":"[taghas[encrypted]!is[system]!sort[created]]","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"<>"},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/FilterByDate":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/FilterByDate","description":"Filter by date (Ex: 20210507)","filter":"[tagregexp:created[^2021]!is[system]!sort[created]]","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"<>"},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/PrivateJournals":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/PrivateJournals","description":"Private journals","filter":"[tagtag[Private]!is[system]!sort[created]]","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"<>"},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/RecentJournals":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/RecentJournals","description":"Recently modified","filter":"[tag!is[system]!sort[modified]limit[14]]","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"<>"},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/SearchJournals":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/SearchJournals","description":"Turn on Search Mode","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"\whitespace trim <$button tooltip={{!!description}} aria-label={{!!description}}> Search <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/journalsearch/searchmode" text="yes"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch" text=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/input" text=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/refresh" text="yes"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=""".xp-diarycard-search input"""/> "},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/StarredJournals":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/StarredJournals","description":"Starred journals","filter":"[tagtag[Star]!is[system]!sort[created]]","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"<>"},"$:/xp/diary/Stylesheet/journal":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Stylesheet/journal","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":"/* 自定义日志条目的样式 */ [data-tags*="Journal"], [data-tiddler-title="Diary"] { border-radius: 8px; } [data-tags*="Private"] { border: 1px solid rgba(94, 54, 191, 0.39); } @media print { .journal .tc-tiddler-body { padding-left: 60px; margin-top: 25px; } .journal .tc-tiddler-title, .journal .tc-subtitle, .journal .tc-tags-wrapper { padding-left: 60px; } } @media screen { .journal .tc-tiddler-title, .journal .tc-subtitle, .journal .tc-tags-wrapper, .journal .tc-tiddler-body { padding-left: 20px; } } @media screen and (max-width: 960px) { .journal .tc-tiddler-title, .journal .tc-subtitle, .journal .tc-tags-wrapper, .journal .tc-tiddler-body { padding-left: 30px; } } .journal:before { content: ""; position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; left: 3px; width: 37px; background: radial-gradient(<> 4px, transparent 5px) repeat-y; background-size: 30.4px 30.4px; z-index: 1010; } .journal .tc-tiddler-body { padding-top: 6px; font-family: "Handlee", cursive; font-weight: 300; line-height: 2em; color: <>; } /* Setting font for other elements */ .journal .tc-tiddler-body pre, .journal .tc-tiddler-body code, .journal .tc-tiddler-body pre code { font-family: "Handlee", cursive; font-weight: 300; }"},"$:/xp/diary/card-template":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/card-template","text":"\define tw-card-template(bordercolor:"")
<$link>
<$list filter="[all[current]has[encrypted]]">{{$:/core/images/locked-padlock}}
<$transclude field="caption"><$view field="title"/>
<$view field="created" format="date" template="YYYY 0MM0DD"/>
